title: Simon Hart – 2022 Statement Confirming Matt Hancock Has Conservative Whip Removed
author: admin
summary: The statement made by Simon Hart, the Conservative Chief Whip, on 1 November 2022.
content:
Following a conversation with Matt Hancock, I have considered the situation and believe this is a matter serious enough to warrant suspension of the whip with immediate effect.
